title: Rengar Counter
body: Just get the teemo to afk in well at lv 1 and your problem is solved rengar's delay is too slow to kill the teemo inside of a well, therefore preventing him gaining 50% of his increased damage, the rengar would need 342 ad and 4001(which he cant get without dying and also already having the 5th stack) to be able to kill the teemo as it takes 0.85 seconds for his q to finish and the well does 1000 pure damage every .28 seconds. Plus the teemo would gain natural levelling from tower, shutdown and epic monster kills, making it even harder to kill making rengar lose out on massive damage, your "broken" problem is solved.

replies.body:
Waste of a good ward

rengar predicts the counter and teams up with {{champion:10}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:203}}  to solve said conundrum.... back to the drawing board

What conundrum. Pure damage passes through all immunity effects other than zhonya and bards ultimate. Kindred, kayle and taric all have their ults penetrated and they have no effect, same with a zilean and GA and all of that, everything but untargetable is killed in the fountain.
true i keep forgetting about that.

And if there is a khazix its even worse because he is stuck at 10% gain instead of 30%, so you snuffed his damage even more than before.

People complain about his "Insta kills" Yet he is incapable of killing a lv 1 teemo who has no armor bonus, even at lv 18, gives you a real sense of how slow his burst actually is. People just over exaggerate it.
